directions: In a large pot over medium heat, place potatoes, celery and onion with water to cover.  Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes, until potatoes are tender.  Drain.
Return vegetables to pot with creamed corn, corn, evaporated milk, cayenne and salt over low heat.  Simmer 20 minutes.
title: Easy Corn Chowder II
